help.short: List all the performance tiers at specified location in a given subscription.
Manage Performance Tier
Get action session operation status.
Manage Recommended Action Sessions Azure Async Operation
Get action session operation result.
Manage Recommended Action Sessions Operation Result
List recommended actions from the advisor.
Get recommended actions from the advisor.
Manage Recommended Action
Create recommendation action session for the advisor.
List recommendation action advisors.
Get a recommendation action advisor.
Manage Advisor
Create a configuration of a server.
List all the configurations in a given server.
Get information about a configuration of server.
Manage Configuration
Create a new database or updates an existing database.
Delete a database.
List all the databases in a given server.
Get information about a database.
Manage Database
Create a new firewall rule or updates an existing firewall rule.
Delete a server firewall rule.
List all the firewall rules in a given server.
Get information about a server firewall rule.
Manage Firewall Rule
Create a MariaDB Server key.
Delete the MariaDB Server key with the given name.
List a list of  Server keys.
Get a MariaDB Server key.
Manage Key
List all the log files in a given server.
Manage Log File
List all the performance tiers for a MariaDB server.
Manage Performance Tier
Create a private endpoint connection with a given name.
Delete a private endpoint connection with a given name.
List all private endpoint connections on a server.
Get a private endpoint connection.
Update private endpoint connection with the specified tags.
Manage Private Endpoint Connection
List the private link resources for MariaDB server.
Get a private link resource for MariaDB server.
Manage Private Link Resource
List the Query-Store query texts for specified queryIds.
Get the Query-Store query texts for the queryId.
Manage Query Text
Get a recoverable MariaDB Server.
Manage Recoverable Server
List all the replicas for a given server.
Manage Replica
Create a threat detection policy.
List the server's threat detection policies.

Manage Security Alert Policy
List the Query-Store top queries for specified metric and aggregation.
Get the query statistic for specified identifier.
Manage Top Query Statistic

Delete the virtual network rule with the given name.

Get a virtual network rule.
Manage Virtual Network Rule
List wait statistics for specified aggregation window.
Get wait statistics for specified identifier.
Manage Wait Statistic
Create a new server or updates an existing server. The update action will overwrite the existing server.
Delete a server.
List all the servers in a given resource group.
Reset data for Query Performance Insight.
Restarts a server.
Get information about a server.
Starts a stopped server.
Stops a running server.
Update an existing server. The request body can contain one to many of the properties present in the normal server definition.

Manage Server
